metadata.title: CVE-2022-22761 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Web-accessible extension pages (pages with a moz-extension:// scheme) werenot correctly enforcing the frame-ancestors directive when it was used inthe Web Extension's Content Security Policy. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 97, Thunderbird < 91.6, and Firefox ESR < 91.6.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
